org.hps.readout.ecal

Class FADCTriggerDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.readout.ecal.TriggerableDriver
        • org.hps.readout.ecal.TriggerDriver
          • org.hps.readout.ecal.FADCTriggerDriver
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FADCTriggerVariableDriver

    public class FADCTriggerDriver
extends TriggerDriver
    Reads clusters and makes trigger decision using opposite quadrant criterion. Prints triggers to file if file path specified.
